result.execSummary:
The defendant Joseph D Olsen was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 1st Degree Child Sex Assault - Sexual Contact with Person under Age of 13 [Modifiers: Lifetime Supervision of Serious Sex Offenders], a class B felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.02(1)(e).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant, Joseph D Olsen, in custody, appeared with Attorney Adam P Nero.  Prosecuting attorney Andrea Amidon Nodolf.  Defendant in custody.  Hanna Neuberg - Clerk 9:04 am
Nero - addresses court on character letters that will be filed later - no changes or additions or corrections to the PSI
State - addresses court on maybe calling Agent Erickson 
Side Bar 9:12 am
State - calls Probation Agent Bradley Erickson - sworn - testifies 
Nero - cross examination of Agent B. Erickson 
Court - questions Agent B. Erickson 
State - reads victim impact statement 
Victim Statements presented in Court
State - makes sentencing presentation - Offers Ex #1 - requesting the Court follow recommendation of 60 years prison with 40 IC and 20 ES - No contacts to remain as indicated in the PSI and No contact with Sarah C. Folch & Nadina M. Folch
Recess 10:11 am 
Back on Record 10:20 am 
Nero - makes sentencing presentation - requesting Court to not sentence deft to maximum sentence - requesting 40 years prison with 20 years IC and 20 years EC
DE - addresses court on sentencing

COURT - Orders Agent Erickson to shred the paper work he has rec'd regarding the psychosexual evaluation - Rec'd Ex #1 
Sentence to 60 years prison - 40 years IC and 20 years ES 
457 days credit 
Ordered to register as a life time sex offender under 939.165 (2) (A)
No contact with NRO 
No contact with Sarah C. Folch & Nadina M. Folch
